name: @seamless-medley/medley
description: Audio engine for Node.js, with built-in "radio like" gapless/seamless playback

scripts.prebuild:docker: cd ../.. && docker build -f packages/node-medley/docker/Dockerfile -t node-medley-prebuild . && docker container create --name node-medley-prebuild-cp node-medley-prebuild && docker cp node-medley-prebuild-cp:/src/packages/node-medley/prebuilds ./packages/node-medley && docker rm node-medley-prebuild-cp
scripts.demo-electron: cross-env MEDLEY_DEV=1 ELECTRON_RUN_AS_NODE=1 electron --require ts-node/register test/demo.ts
